audit_conclusion: The current Orchestr8 v3.0 implementation uses default Marimo styling throughout all plugins and the main application. While the functional architecture is solid, there is ZERO implementation of the stereOS design specification. No CSS variables, custom fonts, status badge system, or animations are in place. All UI elements currently rely on default Marimo components and emoji decorations. A complete design system overhaul is required, starting with Phase 1 (CSS Foundation) and proceeding through all 8 phases of the implementation roadmap. Estimated effort: 40-60 engineering hours for full implementation.
